title: Build sk18
detail: This skateboard lights up differently depending on how hard you kick and push.
extended_details: This skateboard lights up differently depending on how hard you kick and push. Using a microprocessor to interface with an accelerometer and led strips, the skateboard lights will be different depending on how fast you speed up and slow down. Long exposure photos of a skate session will be taken at night to achieve light painting with the skateboard.

parts_and_costs.part: SparkFun Barrel Jack Adapter - USB to 5.5mm
SparkFun Triple Axis Accelerometer Breakout - ADXL345
Adafruit Female DC Power adapter - 2.1mm jack to screw terminal block
